name: Sausage Sports Club (itch)
description:
Sausage Sports Club is a physics game about floppy animals playing sports!

Play solo or couch co-op with up to 4 friends in Adventure Mode! Compete, make friends, and explore the toy-filled Overworld as you make your way through a season of the hit reality show Sausage Sports Club.

Having a party? Perfect! Up to 8 players can compete or play together in Free Play! Any way you play, you’ll unlock tons of customizations in characters, skins, and hats.

Key features: 

  • More than a dozen playable floppy animal characters including Corgis, Pigeons, Flamingos, and more
  • A highly replayable Adventure Mode that works solo or co-op with up to 4 players
  • Various game modes like Soccer, Capture the Flag, Paintball, and more
  • Four unique arenas including Bug Museum, Aquarium, Junkyard, and Tiny Tokyo
  • A huge, toy-filled Overworld spread over four biomes including Jungle, Beach, Desert, and Sportsville
  • Over 100 unlockable customizations through hats and character skins
  • Competitive local multiplayer for up to 8 players on one device
